message.content:
1. The trial was randomized and controlled.
2. The trial involved 356 patients.
3. All patients had stage I (except for T1N0), II or IIIA NSCLC.
4. Patients were assigned to two different treatment arms.
5. One treatment arm was preoperative chemotherapy plus surgery.
6. The other treatment arm was primary surgery.
7. 179 patients were assigned to the preoperative chemotherapy plus surgery arm.
8. 177 patients were assigned to the primary surgery arm.

messages.content:
Statement: In this randomized, controlled trial, 356 patients with stage I (except for T1N0), II and IIIA NSCLC were assigned to either the preoperative chemotherapy plus surgery arm (179 patients) or the primary surgery arm (177 patients).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
